name: Disaster Guard
description:
Some call it delaying the inevitable extinction of mankind. We call it Tuesday.

You work for DisasterGuard, and your job is simple — clock in, keep the world from falling apart, then go home. On this average Tuesday at work, you're faced with the following:

  • The nuclear reactor powering your base is spewing radiation and threatening to meltdown (like usual.)
  • The volcano your base is built on feels like erupting today.
  • Aliens have invaded and are determined to take over.
  • Worst of all, the coffee machine is on its last legs.

Keep the machinery running, shoot down the alien invaders, and keep yourself fueled with a steady supply of snacks and coffee to make it through your shift.

Genre: FPS Survival

Controls
  • WASD — Movement
  • Left Click — Shoot
  • Right Click — Aim Down Sights
  • R — Reload
  • F — Interact
  • Escape — Pause/Unpause
  • Left Click/E — Fire Anti-Air Gun (Arcade Cabinet)
Credits
  • Alan R Tao — Programming
  • Avery Greer — Programming
  • Chase O'Brien — Programming, UI, Level Design
  • Drew Busch — Programming, UI, Level Design
  • Luka Delrado — Programming

  • Noura El Bayrouti — Programming
  • Travis Bittel — Programming, UI
Resources

  • Sci-Fi SFX Pack by _Chris Logsdon_
  • Hordes and Hordes by _Ben Arntz_

DisasterGuard™: Where doomsday is our day job
